posts.title: My First Post
posts.body: Blessed be the name of the Lord for ever and ever. Amen and amen.

posts.title: My 2nd Post
posts.body: The name of the Lord is a strong tower

posts.title: My 3rd Post
posts.body: Oh give thanks unto the Lord

posts.title: My Fourth Post
posts.body: Glory be to the Lord Almighty for ever and ever

posts.title: The name Jesus
posts.body: The name above every other name

posts.title: Gratitude
posts.body: Thank you Lord for the safe delivery of your daughter Rosemary.
